name: Discontinued Flag
description: A material is discontinued if it meets any of the following criteria:
1. The material description starts with a carat (^) or contains "DO NOT USE"
2. For finished good and buyouts, the cross-distribution status is not blank, active (AT), pre-launch (PR), and halted (H)
3. For non-finished good and non-buyouts, the cross-plant material status is not blank
